name: Google Datalogix Search Tools
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Visually appealing userstyle and restoration of the search tools sidebar. Update(5.1) Better fonts, better support for local domains, better support for RTL searches. aesthetic fixes. Update(6.3) Visual fixes update 6.4 bug fix update 6.8 bug fixes for google images carousel
additional_info: Search tools code by Ming-Hsien Lin (akiratw)
